import React, {MouseEvent} from "react" const TablePage=()=>{ const data:{itemNo:number, unit:string, description:string, rate:number, qty:number,amount:number}[]=[ { itemNo:1.1, description:"Clearing of Ordinary Soil, Root and a made up Ground of the site to an average depth of 20 cm from natural ground level", unit:"m2", rate:840.00, qty:18.00, amount: 15120.00 }, { itemNo:1.2, description:"Bulk excavation in an ordinary soil to a depth not exceeding 150 cm from Cleared Level", unit:"m3", rate:1247.09, qty:122.00 , amount: 15120.00 } ] const handleEdit=(event: MouseEvent)=>{ const name:HTMLButtonElement= event.currentTarget console.log(name) } return(
{data.map(item=>( Remove ))}
Item No Description Rate Qty Amount
{item.itemNo} {item.description} {item.rate} {item.qty} {item.amount}
) } export default TablePage
